name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of July 9, a fire broke out in the Hardware City in Zhongshan, Guangdong.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Why is food safety not strictly managed, but film and television works are strictly censored?
Answer: Because if there are problems with food, it is us who are at risk; if there are problems with film and television works, it is them who are at risk.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 8, Shenzhen Futian Xiangqi Building, migrant workers demanded their wages

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhihu Question: Why does the social atmosphere feel so strange recently?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A 2020 paper showed that among the 51 infant formulas sold on the Chinese market in 2018, 17 were found to contain mineral oil hydrocarbons.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 10 (Release) Hubei Enshi. A netizen posted a video saying that he had previously found a fecal suction truck with the words "water delivery truck" pasted on its body. The netizen replied "Bacillus and hygiene"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: July 9, Shantou, Guangdong. A netizen posted a video saying that his 16-year-old son Fang Shiming was tricked out by two men from the same village on July 6 and strangled to death in a corner of the school woods. Afterwards, the murderer left, and the village committee did not inform the family until the body was taken to the funeral home. The village committee said the surveillance camera at the crime scene was broken.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2017, the People's Daily Overseas Edition reported that a Taiwanese political and economic program revealed a "hot news": the mainland uses coal oil to fry dough sticks.
After the media recently exposed that tankers mixed edible oil, some netizens returned to this post for "archaeology". One netizen replied: I thought it was a joke before, but now I find it is a boomerang.
As of now, the post can no longer be found on the People's Daily Overseas Edition Weibo homepage, and the original link has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
July 10, Zhejiang. Netizens posted a video saying that a special tanker truck for edible oil entered a chemical plant.
Public information shows that Zhejiang Richeng New Materials Technology Co., Ltd. belongs to the chemical raw materials and chemical products manufacturing industry, and its business scope includes: refining agent, mercerizing soap, detergent, dispersant, refining aid, silk refining agent, etc.
https://t.co/pkSMAH4PmO
